title: Tripod table
description: Tripod table; Attributed to Pierre Golle (French, about 1620 - 1684, master before 1656); Paris, France; about 1680; Oak veneered with brass, pewter, tortoise shell, walnut, and ebony, with drawers of oak and rosewood; gilded fruitwood; gilt-bronze mounts; 76.8 × 41.9 × 36.2 cm (30 1/4 × 16 1/2 × 14 1/4 in.); 82.DA.34; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
